participant_1.background:
My family is not well off and I wish I could go to a better school.
I spend my days flying planes and working on my hobbies.
I have a healthy diet with plenty of vegetables and fruits, and I am active with my two dogs.
My most valuable possession is my collection of fireworks.
i like doing art projects.

participant_2.background:
I love the smell of beans, but my stomach doesn't.
I love to read books because it transports me to another world and I can forget about my troubles.
I was single for a long time before I met my current boyfriend.
my brother thinks he is a viking.
i m an only child.

content.text: Hey, I heard you like to read books. What's your favorite book?
I have a few favorite books, but I'd say my number one is The Lord of the Rings.
Oh, I loved that series! I read it when I was in high school.
Me too! I've read it so many times, and it never gets old.
I know what you mean. I love the way Tolkien creates such a rich, detailed world.
Me too. And the characters are so well-developed.
Yeah, I always get so attached to them.
I have! I actually saw them before I read the books.
Oh, really? How did you like them?
I thought they were pretty good, but they didn't do the books justice, in my opinion.
Yeah, I know what you mean. The books are so much more detailed.
Yeah, but they were still pretty cool.
Yeah, they were. I'm glad they made them.
